mapper.select: SELECT password FROM Member WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT NICKNAME AS VALUE FROM MEMBER
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Member (ID, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, PROFILEPICTURE, RATING, EMAIL, NAME, PHONE) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{profilePicture, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rating}, #{email}, #{name}, #{phone})
mapper.update: UPDATE Member SET PASSWORD = #{password}, NICKNAME = #{nickname}, PROFILEPICTURE = #{profilePicture, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email}, PHONE = #{phone} WHERE ID = #{id}
